entities.name: scabbers
entities.description: Scabbers is described as an old rat that belonged to Ron's brother. The witch examines Scabbers closely and notes his tattered ear and missing toe.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the owner of Scabbers and defends him against the witch's criticism.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is mentioned as the one who gave Scabbers to Ron.
